About the Company: Valiant Communications Ltd is an equipment manufacturer of telecom transmission equipment and solutions with installations in over 90 countries, worldwide. Valiant`s technological strengths span a wide section of the telecom transmission area including Protection Switching solutions.The product range of the company includes Groomers - Hi-z Non-Intrusive Monitoring products,Digital Access Cross Connect Switching (DACS) solutions,E1, T1 and DS3 Echo Canceller and Voice Quality Enhancement (VQE) solutions,Next Generation STM-1 / STM-4 / STM-16 SDH Multiplexers,E1 and Ethernet Digital Microwave Radios,E1 Drop-Insert (Add-Drop) Multiplexers,E1 PRI ISDN (Q.931) Multiplexers and E1 Channel Banks (Channel Associated Signalling),Ethernet over V.35, E1, E3, DS3 and STM-1 SDH Converters,E1 and T1 over Ethernet (TDMoIP) Converters,E1 and T1 Automatic Protection Switching equipment (1+1 APS),DS3, E3, E1 and T1 Protection (Failover) Switches,etc.
